ValidationRule.description: Only allow partner referral revenue opportunities past Qualified stage if there's a partner referral rebate attached to the account
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), $Profile.Name <> "Order Operations Admin", ISPICKVAL(Type,"Revenue Opportunity"), ISBLANK(Partner_Referral_Opportunity__c), Partner_Referral_Payout_Amount_V2__c!=0, ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Trial"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Decision"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Purchase"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Ready to Ship"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot move Partner Referral Revenue Opportunity past Qualified stage without first creating and linking a rebate opportunity in the Partner Referral Opportunity field.
